name: Midnight Road (marcusnystrand)
description:
INTRODUCTION

Prevent the late night drivers from coming home to their families!
Grab road pieces with LEFT MOUSE BUTTON. Press SPACE while grabbing to rotate.
Rearrange the road pieces to make them stuck in a loop, but make sure they don't drive off the road!

Made by me in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/midnight-road/

If you are experiencing lag, you might have turned off "Use hardware acceleration when available" in Chrome settings.
